title: Brazil
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,090 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 910L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and X
description: Brazil covers many interesting facts about the largest country in South America. Students will learn about the life of Brazil's people today as well as their long history and vibrant celebrations. The book also discusses the many landforms and diverse wildlife throughout the country. Exciting photographs and detailed maps support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
